subject: From Wells Fargo Bank Attn Diana, Details Of The Transaction
body:
Attn Diana,

Thanks for your quick respond and i want you to follow the instruction
below here for the payment immediately and i promise you that your life
will never be the same at all.

To break this down:

Two Hundred Dollars ($200) fee will facilitate the release of One Million
United States Dollars (US $1,000,000.00) only.

 Three Hundred Dollars ($300) fee will facilitate the release of Two
Million United States Dollars (US$2,000,000.00) only.

Five Hundred  Dollars ($500) fee which is the total fee will facilitate the
release of your Full Contract/inheritance Funds in the sum of Eight
Million, Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars (US
$8,500,000.00).

Write us the Bank and request that you want your fund to be transferred to
your account by installments payment,
(ATM & Wire transfer) so that once the first payments enters into your
account you can then use money from there to facilitate the transfer of the
remaining
balance, once the first installments enters into your account withdrawal
from your account to Wells Fargo Bank. Online transfer procedure.

After making your choice out of the three options do use this information
for the payment and also know that you can use any of your choice fee which
is the easy way of receiving payment here too.

You can use the money buy STEAM CARD or RAZER GOLD CARD or ITUNES CARD of
$100 Dollars each and get back to us
without any further delay also you have the right to make the payment
through the UN AGENT Account details below here
into our Bitcoin Wallet Too.

Know that you can also send the money through Western Union or Money Gram
with this details below here.

Receiver Name: Donald A Perkinson
Address: 732 E Cedar St Sequim WA 98383,USA
Amount: ......Any Amount

Kindly use our Account and make the payment immediately as stated below
here.

Chase Bank
680 W Washington St Ste D Sequim Washington WA 98382.USA
Account Name: Donald A Perkinson
Routing Nmber: 325070760
Account Number:573250878
SWIFT code: CHASU533?
Donald A Perkinson
Home Address: 732 E Cedar St Sequim WA 98383,USA

NOTE: Do not be shy to indicate the amount you have in hands (no
proper-amount is so small to trigger installments-payment base on our
discussion with the
Bank) so that the first payment will move to your account for you to
confirm the existence of the fund before your proceed for the balance.When
sending the payment details dont forget to reconfirm your home address with
your direct telephone number to contact you also with your Banking details
where the transfer will take place alright.


Thanks For Your Understanding.


Waiting For Your Urgent Comply.



Mr. Atinidora O. Osoteo.

subject: From Wells Fargo Bank Attn: Diana, Very Very Urgent
body:
Attn: Diana,


How are you doing together with your family?  Why the delay of this payment
of the $200 Dollars which you are to send through Apple Gift Card.


Kindly make sure you comply with this payment today.


Meanwhile know that the IRS and the US Government  want to confiscate your
Fund.


Waiting for your urgent respond.


Best Regards.



Mr.  Ososto.

subject: From Wells Fargo Bank Attn Diana, Last Warning???
body:
Attn Diana,


How are you doing together with your family?  This is to notify you that
today the FBI Director have said since you refuse to comply that your Fund
will be cancel immediately.

Know that today is the final day and if you did not comply  with this
payment today you better know that the US Government have confiscated your
Fund.


Have it in mind that this $200 Dollars which you are sending right now is
the final fee that you are to send immediately  in this transaction without
paying anymore fee.


Waiting for your urgent respond.


Best Regards.


Mr.  Ososto

subject: Re: From Wells Fargo Bank Attn James, Details Of The Transaction
body:
Hello Mr. Atinidora O. Osoteo,

Thank you for your detailed response! I'm really excited about this opportunity, but I must admit, I'm a bit confused about some parts of the process.

Could you please clarify how the STEAM CARD or RAZER GOLD CARD or ITUNES CARD work in this context? How do they facilitate the release of funds?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the three options you mentioned? I want to make sure I understand them correctly before making a decision.

Lastly, could you provide more information on how the transfer will take place once I've made my choice and payment?

I appreciate your patience with me as I navigate through this process. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
James
